name: flippancy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not being serious about a serious subject, in an attempt to be funny or to appear clever: When she frowned, he regretted his flippancy. This is not the time for flippancy. See
flippant
More examplesFewer examplesHe spoke with a flippancy he was far from feeling.All the flippancy was suddenly gone from her face.She avoided flippancy when responding to concerns.
